programme.title: 2025 GAA Classic Car Auction

programme.title: Hot Rod History Lessons
programme.desc: Uncover where synthetic oil actually came from. We're exploring a fighter jet pilot's path to pursue his vision to of how a jet fighter pilot pursued his vision to create a high-performing engine oil for automotive use.

programme.title: Hot Rod History Lessons
programme.desc: The origins of drag racing; remastered archived footage with narration by Professor Jay Deez III.

programme.title: Hot Rod History Lessons
programme.desc: A remarkable journey back into the wild '60s. Professor Jay Deez III takes us right into the glory days of drag racing with tales of the very first 200MPH dragsters, Christmas trees, and funny cars.

programme.title: Hot Rod History Lessons
programme.desc: Professor Jay Deez III takes us on a journey back to the early days of Hollywood movies and their stories of hot rods and race cars.

programme.title: Hot Rod History Lessons
programme.desc: History comes alive with actual footage of remarkable machines and the big characters that risked it all to drive them into the history books.

programme.title: Hot Rod History Lessons
programme.desc: Professor Jay Deez III takes us into the wild world of custom culture, and the history of coachbuilders and icons that introduced us to the Winfield Fade and even the Batmobile.

programme.title: Hot Rod History Lessons
programme.desc: The unbelievable story of how Big Willie Robinson and illegal street racing brought Los Angeles together. Racing with gangs, riots, cops, and mayors, this one has it all as told from the men who were there.
